Definition at line 86 of file data_extension_controller.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Names = $Options->get_setting( 'names' , false );
                        if( $Names !== false )
                        {
                              $Names = explode( ',' , $Names );
                              foreach( $Names as $k => $v )
                              {
                                    if( $this->Security->get_gp( $v , 'set' ) )
                                    {
                                          if( $Options->get_setting( 'type' ) == 'user' )
                                          {
                                                $UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                                                $id = $UserAlgorithms->get_id();
                                          }

                                          $this->DataExtensionAccess->set_data( 
                                                $Options->get_setting( 'id' , $id ) , $Options->get_setting( 'type' ) , $v , 
                                                $this->Security->get_gp( $v , 'string' )
                                          );
                                    }
                              }
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $Args = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $Args , $e );
                  }
